project.name: foss.in2007-india
project.description: This subproject is a place to hold information on organizing the Gentoo booth at FOSS.IN 2007.

longdescription.p: FOSS.IN 2007, will be held at the National Science Symposium Centre, IISc, Bangalore, India from December 04th to 08th. FOSS.IN is India's largest conference on Free and Open Source software.

goals.p: Gentoo will be present at the event, and a stall has been organized for the same, at the FOSS expo. We will be allotted one of the stalls in the 'D' area as shown in this map.

ul.li: Make CDs and DVDs to give-away at the stall
Make T-Shirts: We can't sell them at the stall as per this message
Print stickers to give-away at the stall
Organize hardware and decide on who will man the stall and when :)

tr.ti: The events team will ship a banner
Find a good T-Shirt vendor, create a design and get them printed
Get 100 CDs and 50 DVDs of 2007.0 (or 2007.1, if available) ready. Also procure a CD/DVD writer for use on stall.
